name: tvOS 16.2
available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A user may be able to view sensitive user information
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved data protection.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Parsing a maliciously crafted video file may lead to kernel code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to bypass Privacy preferences
advisories.description: This issue was addressed by enabling hardened runtime.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted file may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Parsing a maliciously crafted TIFF file may lead to disclosure of user information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with improved state handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An issue existed in the parsing of URLs. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: A race condition was addressed with additional validation.

cves.credit: Ian Beer of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Connecting to a malicious NFS server may lead to arbitrary code execution with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved bounds checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause kernel code execution
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: pattern-f (@pattern_F_) of Ant Security Light-Year Lab

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app with root privileges may be able to execute arbitrary code with kernel privileges
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An attacker with arbitrary read and write capability may be able to bypass Pointer Authentication. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been exploited against versions of iOS released before iOS 15.7.1.
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An integer overflow was addressed through improved input validation.

cves.credit: Maddie Stone of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A remote user may be able to cause unexpected app termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Ned Williamson and Nathan Wachholz of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to use arbitrary entitlements
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Ivan Fratric of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Visiting a website that frames malicious content may lead to UI spoofing
advisories.description: A spoofing issue existed in the handling of URLs. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: A user may be able to elevate privileges
advisories.description: An access issue existed with privileged API calls. This issue was addressed with additional restrictions.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: An app may be able to read sensitive location information
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved handling of caches.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Visiting a malicious website may lead to address bar spoofing
advisories.description: A spoofing issue existed in the handling of URLs. This issue was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A use after free issue was addressed with improved memory management.

cves.credit: Maddie Stone of Google Project Zero

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory consumption issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may bypass Same Origin Policy
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may result in the disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

cves.credit: hazbinhotel working with Trend Micro Zero Day Initiative

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved input validation.

cves.credit: Samuel Groß of Google V8 Security
Samuel Groß of Google V8 Security

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may disclose sensitive user information
advisories.description: A logic issue was addressed with improved checks.

cves.credit: Dohyun Lee (@l33d0hyun) of SSD Secure Disclosure Labs & DNSLab, Korea Univ.

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue was addressed with improved state management.

cves.credit: Samuel Groß of Google V8 Security

advisories.available: Apple TV 4K, Apple TV 4K (2nd generation and later), and Apple TV HD
advisories.impact: Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution. Apple is aware of a report that this issue may have been actively exploited against versions of iOS released before iOS 15.1.
advisories.description: A type confusion issue was addressed with improved state handling.

cves.credit: Clément Lecigne of Google's Threat Analysis Group
